name: Swagbot Vs Entropy
description:
This game was created for the MechJam II, over the course of five days. The main theme of Have a Mech is covered by the fact that our Very Cool Protagonist controls their mech with some DIY VR goggles that are hooked up to servos that can crush you. There's also a sprinkle of Surrealism and Build It, Then Use It from among the secondary themes in here.

How to game

  1. Stuff Fruit (tm) in Fruit Slots (tm)
  2. Kill time
  3. Repeat

(A more in-depth tutorial is available in-game)
